name: DHR QC Confirmation - Rev.01
sql_for_additional_access: select user_id from [BsWebService].[dbo].[activeEmployees] where (company='BIT Singapore' and ([function]='Quality' or [function]='Operations' or [function]='Manufacturing')) or user_id in (SELECT [user_id]   FROM [BsWebService].[dbo].[bpm_admin])

data_configuration.name: Associate Material Issuance Template
data_configuration.sql_statement: select 'DHR Production Material Issuance - Rev.01' as value

data_configuration.name: Associate Prod Confirmation Template Family
data_configuration.sql_statement: select 'DHR Production Confirmation' as value

data_configuration.name: Associate QC Route Sheet Template Family
data_configuration.sql_statement: select 'DHR QC Inspection Route Sheet' as value

data_configuration.name: Check Chosen Template
data_configuration.sql_statement: EXEC [DHR_check_chosen_template] '@@template_name','$$selected_order_no'

data_configuration.name: Production Order List
data_configuration.sql_statement:
select * from (
	select  d.process_matrix_id, d.label, d.value from bpm_process_detail d
inner join bpm_process_matrix m on d.process_matrix_id=m.id
where d.process_matrix_id in(
					select  process_matrix_id 
					from bpm_process_detail dd 
						inner join bpm_process_matrix mm on dd.process_matrix_id=mm.id
						inner join bpm_process pp on mm.process_id=pp.id and mm.process_revn=pp.revn and pp.status='close'
						inner join bpm_process_template t on t.id=pp.process_template_id and t.name='$$mtl_issue_tmpl' 
					where dd.label='status' and dd.value='in progress' 
				)

) detailResult 
PIVOT (
	MAX(value) 
	for label in (
		[Please Choose Production Line],
		[Please Choose Production Line Sub-group],
		[order No],
		[Production Order Display]
	)
)
as material_issuing_table

data_configuration.name: Material_Issuance_header_detail
data_configuration.sql_statement:
select top 1 * from (
    select p.id as process_id,d.process_matrix_id, d.label, d.value 
    from bpm_process_detail d  WITH (NOLOCK)
    inner join bpm_process_matrix m WITH (NOLOCK) on d.process_matrix_id=m.id and m.type='initiator'
    inner join bpm_process p WITH (NOLOCK) on m.process_id=p.id and m.process_revn=p.revn
    inner join bpm_process_template t WITH (NOLOCK) on t.id=p.process_template_id 
        and t.name='$$mtl_iss_tmpl'
        --and t.name='DHR Production Material Issuance - Rev.01'
    and  d.process_matrix_id in(
            select process_matrix_id 
            from bpm_process_detail  WITH (NOLOCK)
            where [label]='Order No' 
            and [value]='$$orderNo'
            -- and [value]='210000162552'
        ) and d.process_matrix_id in(
            select process_matrix_id 
            from bpm_process_detail WITH (NOLOCK)  
            where [label]='status' and [value]='in progress' 
        ) 
    ) detailResult  
PIVOT ( 
    MAX(value) 
    for label in (
        [Order No],
        [Material], 
        [Material Description], 
        [Store Location], 
        [Plan Qty], 
        [Batch No], 
        [Start Date], 
        [Revision], 
        [Drawing Number], 
        [Alt BOM], 
        [Drawing Rev#], 
        [End Date], [Remarks],
        [Please Choose Production Line], 
        [Please Choose Production Line Sub-group]
    ) 
) as material_issuing_table

data_configuration.name: Material_Issuance_item_list_detail
data_configuration.sql_statement:
select * from (
			select d.process_matrix_id, tc.row_index,tc.label, tc.value from [dbo].[bpm_process_table_cell] tc
			inner join bpm_process_detail d on 
				tc.parent_process_detail_id=d.id  and d.label='item list'
				inner join bpm_process_matrix m on d.process_matrix_id=m.id and m.type='initiator' and 
				m.id in  (
					select process_matrix_id 
					from bpm_process_detail dd 
						inner join bpm_process_matrix mm on dd.process_matrix_id=mm.id
						inner join bpm_process p on mm.process_id=p.id and mm.process_revn=p.revn and p.status='close'
						inner join bpm_process_template t on t.id=p.process_template_id and 
						--t.name = 'DHR Production Material Issuance - Rev.01' 
						t.name = '$$mtl_iss_tmpl' 
					where dd.label='Order No' and  dd.value in (
						select top 1 * 
						--from string_split ('210000171081','-'))
						from string_split ('$$orderNo','-'))
					)  			
		) tableResult 
		PIVOT (
		        MAX(value) 
			for label in (
				[Item Cat],
				[Item Code],
				[Item Code Desc],
				[Quantity],
				[Unit],
				[SS],
				[Qty Actual],
				[Batch/Serial No],
				[SLED],
				[Sloc],
				[Alt Gp],
				[AltG Pr]
			)
		)
		as material_issuing_item_list

data_configuration.name: Material Issuing Attachment List
data_configuration.sql_statement: EXEC [dbo].[DHR_attachment_by_matrix] '$$pid','initiator','Attachment List','yes'

data_configuration.name: Find Production Confirmation ID by Order No
data_configuration.sql_statement:
select top 1 p.id as process_id
from [dbo].[bpm_process_detail] d
inner join [dbo].[bpm_process_matrix] m 
	on d.process_matrix_id=m.id and m.type='initiator' 
		and d.label='Order No' 
		and d.value='$$order_no'
		--and d.value='210000162552' 
inner join [dbo].[bpm_process] p on m.process_id=p.id and m.process_revn = p.revn
and p.status='close' 
inner join [dbo].[bpm_process_template] t 
on p.process_template_id=t.id 
and t.name like '$$prd_cfm_tmpl'+'%'
--and t.name like 'DHR Production Confirmation%'
order by p.last_update desc

data_configuration.name: Find Production Confirmation Total Qty by pid
data_configuration.sql_statement:
select *
         from (	
	select tc.label,tc.value,tc.row_index+1 as [line]			
			from [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process_table_cell tc 
				inner join [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process_detail d on tc.parent_process_detail_id=d.id
				inner join [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process_matrix m on d.process_matrix_id=m.id 
				inner join [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process p on m.process_id=p.id and m.process_revn=p.revn and p.status='close' 
				and p.id='$$prd_cfm_id'
				 --and p.id='prd-cfm-01-20220911144116'
				and d.label='Total Qty Summary'
			) detailResult  
		PIVOT ( 
			MAX(value)  
			for label in (
				[Station],
				[Plan Qty],
				[Accept Qty], 
				[Reject Qty],
				[Test Qty],
				[Station Total],
				[Station Total - Last Accept Qty],
				[Last Update On]
			) 
		) as pivot_table

data_configuration.name: Find Production Confirmation Total Qty Breakdown by pid
data_configuration.sql_statement:
select *
         from (	
	select tc.label,tc.value,tc.row_index+1 as [line]			
			from [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process_table_cell tc 
				inner join [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process_detail d on tc.parent_process_detail_id=d.id
				inner join [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process_matrix m on d.process_matrix_id=m.id 
				inner join [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process p on m.process_id=p.id and m.process_revn=p.revn and p.status='close' 
				and p.id='$$prd_cfm_id'
				 --and p.id='prd-cfm-01-20220911144116'
				and d.label='Total Qty Breakdown'
			) detailResult  
		PIVOT ( 
			MAX(value)  
			for label in (
				[Station],
				[Shift],
				[Plan Qty], 
				[Accept Qty], 
				[Reject Qty],
				[Test Qty],
				[Initiated By],
				[Completion Date],
				[Verified By],
				[Verified On],
				[Process ID],
				[Process Url]
			) 
		) as pivot_table

data_configuration.name: Prod Route Sheet Attachment List
data_configuration.sql_statement:
select *
         from (	
	select tc.label,tc.value,tc.row_index+1 as [line]		
			from [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process_table_cell tc 
				inner join [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process_detail d on tc.parent_process_detail_id=d.id
				inner join [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process_matrix m on d.process_matrix_id=m.id 
				inner join [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process p on m.process_id=p.id and m.process_revn=p.revn and p.status='close' 
				and p.id='$$prd_cfm_id'
				 --and p.id='prd-cfm-01-20220911144116'
				and d.label='Route Sheet Attachment List'

			) detailResult  
		PIVOT ( 
			MAX(value)  
			for label in (
				[Attachment Name],
				[Attachment Url],
				[Upload By],
				[Upload On]
			) 
		) as pivot_table

data_configuration.name: Find Equipment Check Summary by pid
data_configuration.sql_statement:
select *
         from (	
	select tc.label,tc.value,tc.row_index+1 as [line]			
			from [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process_table_cell tc 
				inner join [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process_detail d on tc.parent_process_detail_id=d.id
				inner join [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process_matrix m on d.process_matrix_id=m.id 
				inner join [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process p on m.process_id=p.id and m.process_revn=p.revn and p.status='close' 
				and p.id='$$prd_cfm_id'
				 --and p.id='prd-cfm-01-20230201103214'
				and d.label='Equipment Check Summary'
			) detailResult  
		PIVOT ( 
			MAX(value)  
			for label in (
				[Station],
				[Shift],
				[Equipment Name],
				[Equipment ID], 
				[Calibration due date],
				[Maintenance due date],
				[Parameter Description],
				[Parameter Value],
				[Remark],
				[Initiated By],
				[Completion Date],
				[Verified By],
				[Verified On],				
				[Process ID],
				[Process Url]
			) 
		) as pivot_table

data_configuration.name: Find Chemical Check Summary by pid
data_configuration.sql_statement:
select *
         from (	
	select tc.label,tc.value,tc.row_index+1 as [line]			
			from [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process_table_cell tc 
				inner join [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process_detail d on tc.parent_process_detail_id=d.id
				inner join [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process_matrix m on d.process_matrix_id=m.id 
				inner join [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process p on m.process_id=p.id and m.process_revn=p.revn and p.status='close' 
				and p.id='$$prd_cfm_id'
				 --and p.id='prd-cfm-01-20230201103214'
				and d.label='Chemical Check Summary'
			) detailResult  
		PIVOT ( 
			MAX(value)  
			for label in (
				[Station],
				[Shift],
				[Chemical],
				[Batch Number], 
				[Expiration Date],
				[Remark],
				[Initiated By],
				[Completion Date],
				[Verified By],
				[Verified On],	
				[Process ID],
				[Process Url]
			) 
		) as pivot_table

data_configuration.name: Find Header data by production confirmation ID
data_configuration.sql_statement:
select *
         from (	
	select d.label,d.value		
			from  [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process_detail d 
				inner join [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process_matrix m on d.process_matrix_id=m.id 
				inner join [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process p on m.process_id=p.id and m.process_revn=p.revn and p.status='close' 
				and p.id='$$prd_cfm_id'
				--and p.id='prd-cfm-01-20220911144116'
			) detailResult  
		PIVOT ( 
			MAX(value)  
			for label in (
				[QTY Prod Finished],
				[Total Reject Qty],
				[Total Test Qty],
				[Remark],
				[Labour Hour],
				[Job Order Start],
				[Job Order Finish]
			) 
		) as pivot_table

data_configuration.name: QC Total Test Qty by Shift
data_configuration.sql_statement:
select  
		[process_id],
		[process_revn],
'/#/my-open-processes/view-detail/'+[process_id]+'/'+cast([process_revn] as varchar) as process_url,
        [Shift],
        [Reject Qty], 
        [Total Test Qty],
        [Destructive Test Qty],
        [Remark / NCIR / Test],
	   [route sheet sequence],
	   ISNULL([Original Initiator],[By]) as [Original Initiator],
		COALESCE([Original Completion Date],[Update on]) as [Original Completion Date], 
		ISNULL([Selected Line Verification Approver],[Approved By]) as [Verified By],
		COALESCE([Line Verification On],[Approved on]) as 	[Verified on]
	   from (
			--select p.id as last_process_id,p.revn as last_process_revn, p.last_update, d.process_matrix_id, d.label, d.value			
	    select  d.label, d.value,p.id as process_id,p.revn as process_revn,
		(select top 1 e.first_name+' '+e.last_name+' ('+e.user_id+')' 
			from [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process_matrix m1 
			inner join [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process p1 
			on m1.process_id=p1.id and m1.process_revn=p1.revn and p1.id=p.id and p1.revn=p.revn and m1.type='initiator'
		    inner join [BsWebService].[dbo].[func_get_all_employees](DEFAULT) e on m1.user_id=e.user_id
		) as [By],
		(select top 1  m.action_on
			from [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process_matrix m1 
			inner join [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process p1 
			on m1.process_id=p1.id and m1.process_revn=p1.revn and p1.id=p.id and p1.revn=p.revn and m1.type='initiator'
		) as [Update on],
		(select top 1  e.first_name+' '+e.last_name+' ('+e.user_id+')' 
			from [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process_matrix m1 
			inner join [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process p1 
			on m1.process_id=p1.id and m1.process_revn=p1.revn and p1.id=p.id and p1.revn=p.revn and m1.type='approver'
		    inner join [BsWebService].[dbo].[func_get_all_employees](DEFAULT) e on m1.user_id=e.user_id
		) as [Approved By],
		(select top 1  m1.action_on
			from [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process_matrix m1 
			inner join [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process p1 
			on m1.process_id=p1.id and m1.process_revn=p1.revn and p1.id=p.id and p1.revn=p.revn and m1.type='initiator'
		) as [Approved on]

		from [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process_detail d 
				inner join [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process_matrix m on d.process_matrix_id=m.id
				inner join [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process p on m.process_id=p.id and m.process_revn=p.revn and p.status='close' 
				inner join [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process_template t on p.process_template_id=t.id  
				and t.name like 'DHR QC Inspection Route Sheet%'
				and  d.process_matrix_id in(
					select d1.process_matrix_id 
					from [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process_detail d1
					inner join [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process_matrix m1 on d1.process_matrix_id=m.id and m.id=m1.id
					inner join [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process p1 on p1.id=p.id and m1.process_id=p1.id and m1.process_revn=p1.revn
					where label='Order No' and value='$$order_no'
					  --where label='Order No' and value='210000196800'
				) 
				

			) detailResult  
		PIVOT ( 
			MAX(value)  
			for label in (
				[Shift],
				[Reject Qty], 
				[Total Test Qty],
				[Destructive Test Qty],
				[Remark / NCIR / Test],
				[route sheet sequence],
				[Original Initiator],
				[Original Completion Date],
				[Selected Line Verification Approver],
				[Line Verification On]
			) 
		) as route_sheet_table 

		order by [route sheet sequence]

data_configuration.name: QC Released Qty
data_configuration.sql_statement: parseInt($$qty_prod_finished)-parseInt($$reject_qty)-parseInt($$destructive_qty)

data_configuration.name: QC Test Items Detail
data_configuration.sql_statement: EXEC DHR_get_qc_test_items_detail_by_order_no '$$order_no'

data_configuration.name: Route Sheet Attachment List
data_configuration.sql_statement:
select
   process_id,
   [Upload By],
   [Update On],
   [Attachment Name],
   [Attachment URL] 
from (
select  tc.label,
         tc.value,process_id
      from  [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process_table_cell tc with (nolock) 
         inner join [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process_detail d with (nolock) 
            on tc.parent_process_detail_id = d.id 
            and d.label like '%Attachment List%' 
            and d.label != 'Material Issuance Attachment List' 
         inner join [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process_matrix m with (nolock) 
            on d.process_matrix_id = m.id 
			and d.process_matrix_id in (
				select d1.process_matrix_id 
				from [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process_detail d1 with (nolock) 
					inner join [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process_matrix m1 with (nolock) 
                      on d1.process_matrix_id = m1.id and m1.id = m.id
					  and d1.value ='$$order_no'
                      --and d1.value = '210000162552' 
			)
		inner join [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process p with (nolock) 
					on m.process_id = p.id 
					and m.process_revn = p.revn and p.status='close'
        inner join
            [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process_template t with (nolock) 
            on t.id = p.process_template_id
			and t.name like '$$route_sheet_tmpl_family'+'%'
            --and t.name like 'DHR QC Inspection Route Sheet%' 
 inner join [BsWebService].[dbo].[func_get_all_employees](DEFAULT) e 
            on e.user_id = m.user_id 
   )  tableResult 
   PIVOT ( MAX(value) for [label] in 
   (
      [Attachment Name],
      [Attachment URL],
      [Upload By],
      [Update On] 
   )
) as pivot_table 

UNION ALL

select p.id as process_id,
e.first_name + ' ' + e.last_name + ' (' + e.user_id + ')' as [Upload By],
m.action_on as [Update On],
a.file_path as [Attachment Name],
   '/download/' + a.process_matrix_id + '/' + a.file_path as [Attachment URL] 
from [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process_attachement a with (nolock) 
   inner join [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process_matrix m with (nolock) 
         on a.process_matrix_id = m.id 
and m.id in (
	select d1.process_matrix_id 
				from [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process_detail d1 with (nolock) 
					inner join [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process_matrix m1 with (nolock) 
                      on d1.process_matrix_id = m1.id and m1.id = m.id
                      and d1.label = 'Order No' 
					  and d1.value ='$$order_no'
                      --and d1.value = '210000162552' 
)
inner join [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process p with (nolock) 
      on m.process_id = p.id 
      and m.process_revn = p.revn and p.status='close'
inner join
    [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process_template t with (nolock) 
    on t.id = p.process_template_id 							
	and t.name like '$$route_sheet_tmpl_family'+'%'
    --and t.name like 'DHR QC Inspection Route Sheet%' 
left join [BsWebService].[dbo].[func_get_all_employees](DEFAULT) e 
      on e.user_id = m.user_id

data_configuration.name: QC Equipment Information Summary
data_configuration.sql_statement: exec [dbo].[DHR_get_equipment_check_summary_for_qc_confirmation_by_order_no] '$$route_sheet_tmpl_family','$$order_no'

data_configuration.name: Production Rejected Qty
data_configuration.sql_statement: parseInt($$plan_qty)-parseInt($$prod_finished_qty)

data_configuration.name: QC Rejected Qty
data_configuration.sql_statement: parseInt($$reject_qty)

data_configuration.name: QC destructive Qty

data_configuration.name: Auto Populated Subject
data_configuration.sql_statement: "QcConfirm_$$batchNo"

data_configuration.name: Update QC Confirmation Status to Cancel

data_configuration.name: QC Confirmation Template Family
data_configuration.sql_statement: "DHR QC Confirmation"

data_configuration.name: Previous QC Confirmation Attachment List
data_configuration.sql_statement: exec [dbo].[DHR_attachment_by_order_no] '$$Current_template','$$order_no','Previous QC Confirmation Attachment List'

data_configuration.name: Production Confirmation Attachment List
data_configuration.sql_statement: exec [dbo].[DHR_attachment_by_order_no] 'DHR Production Confirmation','$$order_no','Previous Production Confirmation Attachment List'

formula_list.formula: C16=(function(){function getDateYYYYMMDD(d){return [   d.getFullYear(),   ('0' + (d.getMonth() + 1)).slice(-2),   ('0' + d.getDate()).slice(-2) ].join('')} return parseInt(getDateYYYYMMDD(new Date(C5)))-parseInt(getDateYYYYMMDD(new Date())) })()

C17=(function(){function getDateYYYYMMDD(d){return [   d.getFullYear(),   ('0' + (d.getMonth() + 1)).slice(-2),   ('0' + d.getDate()).slice(-2) ].join('')} return parseInt(getDateYYYYMMDD(new Date(C6)))-parseInt(getDateYYYYMMDD(new Date())) })()

C13=(function(){function getDateYYYYMMDD(d){return [   d.getFullYear(),   ('0' + (d.getMonth() + 1)).slice(-2),   ('0' + d.getDate()).slice(-2) ].join('')} return parseInt(getDateYYYYMMDD(new Date(C5)))-parseInt(getDateYYYYMMDD(new Date())) })()

users.label: Update Status of Old Process to Cancel
